channel.title: Min Wen
channel.description: Blogs and Portfolios for Min Wen

item.title: Pre-Reading Prep: Unlock a Book's Secrets Before You Crack It Open
item.description: Tired of dense books? Learn how to leverage large language models (LLMs) and targeted research to gain a head start on understanding a book's core ideas before you even begin reading.

item.title: Streamline Your Workflow: Why Your Team Needs to Embrace Microsoft Teams Channels
item.description: Ditch the group chat chaos and streamline your team communication with the power of Microsoft Teams Channels.
